title: Ep. 44 - Best Of Part 1
description:
The guys are on vacation, so they've picked some of their favorite segments, conversations, and moments from the last 6 months. As always, each of the guys pick a couple of Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeshow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
